title: Missing Loot(Client)
body: I have not played league in almost a month and when I logged in just now all of my Champion shards,blue/orange essence and keys/chests are missing from my loot page. Please help O_O

replies.body:
Hey there,

That's really odd, perhaps your account was compromised?

I'd suggest [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support to have them take a look.
